channel.title: A always get this stupid error!
channel.description:
Can anybody help me fix this??? BTW i meant to put "I ALWAYS GET THIS STUPID ERROR!" <--lol sorry
[code]NPCHandler.java:285: illegal start of expression public void MonsterDropItems(int NPCID) { ^ NPCHandler.java:357: illegal start of expression public void MonsterDropItem(int newItemID, int newItemAmount, int NPCID)
^ NPCHandler.java:632: illegal start of expression public static int worldmap2[][] = { ^ NPCHandler.java:641: illegal start of expression public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn't remove - xerozcheez
^ NPCHandler.java:642: illegal start of expression public static int removeschaos[] = {1,2,2,2}; ^ NPCHandler.java:644: illegal start of expression public static int randomremoveschaos() ^ NPCHandler.java:981: ';' expected System.out.println(str); ^ 7 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
and that last error is the most annoying...[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 04:31:10 PM[/size][hr]C'mon i know [i]somebody[/i] can help me...

item.title: A always get this stupid error!
item.dc:creator: @deltorz deltorz
item.description:
@deltorz wrote:

Can anybody help me fix this??? BTW i meant to put “I ALWAYS GET THIS STUPID ERROR!” <–lol sorry

[code]NPCHandler.java:285: illegal start of expression
public void MonsterDropItems(int NPCID) {
^
NPCHandler.java:357: illegal start of expression
public void MonsterDropItem(int newItemID, int newItemAmount, int NPCID)

    ^

NPCHandler.java:632: illegal start of expression
public static int worldmap2[][] = {
^
NPCHandler.java:641: illegal start of expression
public int remove = 2; // 1 = removes equipment, 2 = doesn’t remove - xerozcheez

^
NPCHandler.java:642: illegal start of expression
public static int removeschaos[] = {1,2,2,2};
^
NPCHandler.java:644: illegal start of expression
public static int randomremoveschaos()
^
NPCHandler.java:981: ‘;’ expected
System.out.println(str);
^
7 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

and that last error is the most annoying…[br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2006, 04:31:10 PM[/size][hr]C’mon i know somebody can help me…
